item.title: Make smart a dumb coffee machine with ESPHome
item.author: gmail.com (Earving)
item.description: As a Coffee loverâ€¦ of course this post had to start that way. I have a dumb coffee machine for my morning coffee on my way to work. It is just an on-off coffee machine, the brewing cycle last around 10 min and then it just keeps warm the jar.
